column1: #Text=Kuvira says : " Bring the citizens of Zaofu to kneel before the Great Uniter !
#Text=" Baatar says : " I am so disappointed in you , Junior .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Take them away !
#Text=" Huan says : " Get your hands off me !
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " All hail the Great Uniter !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Are you sure , there 's no way they survived ?
#Text=But I think I can replicate his work with the spirit vines and get us back on track .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " How would you like to help Baatar build the most powerful weapon the world has ever seen ?
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " It would be my honor , Great Uniter .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Begin dismantling the domes .
#Text=" Main Bolin Jinora Korra Opal Beifong Suyin Beifong Varrick Wei and Wing Antagonists Baatar Jr. .
